prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" No, you are not a friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you.

I am sorry to say that our friendship is over. You have falsely accused me of lying about what you said and then refused to apologize when I proved you wrong by quoting your own words back to you. This shows a lack of humility on your part, which I cannot respect.

Furthermore, your comments regarding my military service were incredibly disrespectful. You claimed that many "combat veterans" of Vietnam "smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite," implying that I did not see any actual combat during my time there. Additionally, you made light of my position as an Army officer by suggesting that I spent most of my time inside the Danang Air Base rather than out on the front lines with the infantry marines.

As a result of these actions, I no longer consider us to be friends. Your behavior has shown a complete disregard for basic human decency and respect, and I cannot tolerate such behavior from someone who claims to be my friend.

Additionally, your remarks regarding my military service were highly insulting. You suggested that many "combat veterans" of Vietnam "smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite", implying that I did not experience any real combat during my time there. Moreover, you downplayed my role as an Army officer by claiming that I spent most of my time inside the Danang Air Base instead of out on the frontlines with the infantry marines.

Due to these actions, I can no longer consider you a friend. Your behavior shows a complete disregard for basic human decency and respect, and I cannot tolerate this from someone who considers themselves my friend.

Furthermore, your comments about my military service were extremely disrespectful. You implied that many "combat veterans" of Vietnam "smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite", which is a blatant insult to all those who served in the armed forces during that time period. Additionally, you trivialized my role as an Army officer by claiming that I spent most of my time inside the Danang Air Base rather than on the front lines with the infantry marines.

Based on these actions, I can no longer consider you a friend. Your behavior reflects a total lack of respect for basic human values, and I cannot tolerate this from someone who claims to be my friend.

I regret to inform you that our friendship has reached its conclusion due to recent events. In particular, you made unfounded accusations towards me concerning a statement you had made previously, but refused to apologize even after I presented evidence disproving your claims by repeating what you said verbatim. This unwillingness to admit fault demonstrates a severe lack of integrity on your part, which is unacceptable to me.

In addition, your remarks regarding my military service were highly offensive and showed no consideration for those who served during the Vietnam War. Your assertion that many "combat veterans" were more familiar with the scent of perfume from prostitutes than they were with gunfire was not only inaccurate but also deeply disrespectful to all service members who risked their lives in combat. Moreover, your dismissive attitude towards my role as an Army officer, suggesting that I spent the majority of my time at the Danang Air Base instead of actively engaging with the infantry marines, further undermines any trust I may have had in you.

Given these circumstances, I am unable to maintain our friendship moving forward. Your conduct reveals a profound disregard for fundamental moral principles, and I cannot associate myself with such behavior.

Furthermore, your comments about my time in the military were extremely hurtful and showed a complete lack of respect for those who served in the Vietnam War. Your claim that most "combat veterans" were more familiar with the smell of perfume from prostitutes than they were with gunfire was both wrong and disrespectful to all the brave men and women who fought in the war. Your flippant attitude toward my position as an army officer, implying that I mostly stayed at the airbase instead of being with the infantry marines, only added insult to injury.

Under these conditions, I can no longer continue our friendship. Your actions demonstrate a complete lack of morals and integrity, and I cannot be associated with someone who behaves like that.
